00039 #include "omnidrive_controller/OmniDrivePositionController.h"
00040 #include "trajectory_generator/OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator.h"
00041 
00042 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/Conversions.h"
00043 #include "navigation_trajectory_follower/TrajectoryFollowerNode.h"
00044 
00045 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
00046 #include "nav_msgs/Odometry.h"
00047 #include "nav_msgs/Path.h"
00048 #include "geometry_msgs/Twist.h"
00049 
00050 #include "kdl/trajectory_composite.hpp"
00051 
00052 using namespace std;
00053 
00054 ros::Publisher twistPublisher;
00055 Odometry actualOdometry;
00056 IPositionController* controller;
00057 ros::Time startTime;
00058 
00059 ros::Publisher debugPath;
00060 
00061 void poseRosToPose2d(const geometry_msgs::Pose& pose, Pose2D& pose2d) {
00062 
00063     double x = pose.position.x;
00064     double y = pose.position.y;
00065     double theta = tf::getYaw(pose.orientation);
00066 
00067     pose2d = Pose2D(x, y, theta);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void twistRosToTwist2d(const geometry_msgs::Twist& twist, Twist2D& twist2d) {
00071 
00072     double x = twist.linear.x;
00073     double y = twist.linear.y;
00074     double theta = twist.angular.z;
00075 
00076     twist2d = Twist2D(x, y, theta);
00077 
00078 }
00079 
00080 void pose2dToPoseRos(const Pose2D& pose2d, geometry_msgs::Pose& pose) {
00081 
00082     pose.position.x = pose2d.getX();
00083     pose.position.y = pose2d.getY();
00084     tf::Quaternion quat;
00085 
00086     quat.setRPY(0, 0, pose2d.getTheta());
00087     tf::quaternionTFToMsg(quat, pose.orientation);
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 void twist2dToTwistRos(const Twist2D& twist2d, geometry_msgs::Twist& twist) {
00092 
00093     twist.linear.x = twist2d.getX();
00094     twist.linear.y = twist2d.getY();
00095     twist.angular.z = twist2d.getTheta();
00096 
00097 }
00098 
00099 void odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry) {
00100 
00101     const geometry_msgs::Pose pose = odometry.pose.pose;
00102     const geometry_msgs::Twist twist = odometry.twist.twist;
00103 
00104     Pose2D pose2d;
00105     Twist2D twist2d;
00106 
00107     poseRosToPose2d(pose, pose2d);
00108     twistRosToTwist2d(twist, twist2d);
00109 
00110     actualOdometry = Odometry(pose2d, twist2d);
00111 
00112 }
00113 
00114 void pathCallback(const nav_msgs::Path& path) {
00115     OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator trajectoryGenerator;
00116 
00117     std::vector<FrameWithId> pathKDL;
00118     conversions::pathRosToPath(path, pathKDL);
00119     ROS_INFO("Path size: %lu", pathKDL.size());
00120 
00121     KDL::Trajectory_Composite trajectoryKDL;
00122     trajectoryGenerator.computeTrajectroy(pathKDL, trajectoryKDL);
00123 
00124     startTime = ros::Time::now();
00125     controller->setTargetTrajectory(trajectoryKDL);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void publishOdometry(const Odometry& odometry) {
00129 
00130     geometry_msgs::Twist twist;
00131     geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
00132     pose2dToPoseRos(odometry.getPose2D(), pose);
00133     twist2dToTwistRos(odometry.getTwist2D(), twist);
00134 
00135     nav_msgs::Odometry odomRos;
00136     odomRos.pose.pose = pose;
00137     odomRos.twist.twist = twist;
00138     odomRos.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00139 
00140     twistPublisher.publish(twist);
00141 
00142 }
00143 
00144 void controlLoop() {
00145 
00146     double elapsedTime = ros::Duration(ros::Time::now() - startTime).toSec();
00147     Odometry newOdometry = controller->computeNewOdometry(actualOdometry, elapsedTime);
00148     publishOdometry(newOdometry);
00149 
00150 }
00151 
00152 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00153 
00154     std::string name = "trajectory_follower";
00155     ros::init(argc, argv, name);
00156 
00157     ros::NodeHandle node = ros::NodeHandle("~/");
00158     ros::NodeHandle globalNode = ros::NodeHandle();
00159 
00160     double cycleFrequencyInHz;
00161 
00162     double velocityGainTranslation;
00163     double positionGainTranslation;
00164     double velocityToleranceTranslation;
00165     double positionToleranceTranslation;
00166 
00167     double velocityGainRotation;
00168     double positionGainRotation;
00169     double velocityToleranceRotation;
00170     double positionToleranceRotation;
00171 
00172     string inputPathTopic;
00173     string inputOdometryTopic;
00174     string inputVelocityTopic;
00175 
00176     node.param("cycleFrequencyInHz", cycleFrequencyInHz, 50.0);
00177 
00178     node.param("velocityGainTranslation", velocityGainTranslation, 1.33);
00179     node.param("positionGainTranslation", positionGainTranslation, 0.2);
00180     node.param("positionToleranceTranslation", positionToleranceTranslation, 0.1);
00181     node.param("velocityToleranceTranslation", velocityToleranceTranslation, 0.01);
00182 
00183     node.param("velocityGainRotation", velocityGainRotation, 1.35);
00184     node.param("positionGainRotation", positionGainRotation, 1.0);
00185     node.param("positionToleranceRotation", positionToleranceRotation, 0.1);
00186     node.param("velocityToleranceRotation", velocityToleranceRotation, 0.01);
00187 
00188     node.param<string > ("inputPathTopic", inputPathTopic, "simplified_path");
00189     node.param<string > ("inputOdometryTopic", inputOdometryTopic, "odom");
00190     node.param<string > ("outputVelocityTopic", inputVelocityTopic, "cmd_vel");
00191 
00192 
00193     ROS_INFO("velocityGainTranslation: %f", velocityGainTranslation);
00194     ROS_INFO("velocityGainRotation: %f", velocityGainRotation);
00195     ROS_INFO("positionGainTranslation: %f", positionGainTranslation);
00196     ROS_INFO("positionGainRotation: %f", positionGainRotation);
00197 
00198 
00199     //ros::Subscriber trajectorySubscriber;
00200     ros::Subscriber pathSubscriber;
00201     ros::Subscriber odomSubscriber;
00202     twistPublisher = globalNode.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist > (inputVelocityTopic, 1);
00203     odomSubscriber = globalNode.subscribe(inputOdometryTopic, 1, &odomCallback);
00204     pathSubscriber = globalNode.subscribe(inputPathTopic, 1, &pathCallback);
00205 
00206     controller = new OmniDrivePositionController(positionGainTranslation,
00207             velocityGainTranslation,
00208             positionGainRotation,
00209             velocityGainRotation,
00210             positionToleranceTranslation,
00211             velocityToleranceTranslation,
00212             positionToleranceRotation,
00213             velocityToleranceRotation);
00214 
00215     ros::Rate r(cycleFrequencyInHz);
00216 
00217     debugPath = globalNode.advertise <nav_msgs::Path > ("debugRollingWindow", 1);
00218 
00219     while (ros::ok()) {
00220         ros::spinOnce();
00221         controlLoop();
00222         r.sleep();
00223     }
00224 
00225     delete controller;
00226 
00227     return 0;
00228 }
